page.title: 10About a Seven Year old.
page.content: My name is{Matthew Wood.}I am seven and a half years old. I live in a house called{'Pinfarthings'}opposite the village green. I live with my mum and dad and my sister{Julie}who is nearly ten. I go to school on my own, but when it is raining I go in the car. I wear neat clothes and I like going to school. I have one hamster and his name is{Fudgie.}My sister's hamster is called{Goldilocks.}My favourite meal is roast chicken; I like the crispy skin! My favourite pudding is mince pie. After school I like playing on my bike with my friends and I sometimes watch television. We visit my Nan and Grandpa in{Minchinhampton}and my other Nan in{Gloucester.}We quite often visit my cousins in{Reading.}We travel by car.
